text: Agar jald wasool honey wala maal-o-asbaab hota aur halka sa safar hota to yeh zaroor aap kay peechay ho letay lekin unn per doori aur daraz ki mushkil parr gaee. Abb ato yeh Allah ki qasmen khayen gay kay agar hum mein qooat-o-taqat hoti to hum yaqeenan aap kay sath nikaltay yeh apni janon ko khud hi halakat mein daal rahey hain inn kay jhootay honey ka sacha ilm Allah ko hai
